extendedInfo.description: Working on shifts? Sicking tired of track your salary manually?Meet 'Track My Salary'! The app that gonna let you track your salary easily and with minimum effort! Just create your workplace, enter your salary and you are good to go!When you arrive to work press check in, and when you leave work press check out!It even has a widget to make it easier!App features:* Track your salary in a nice and easy way.* Set up extra hours and expenses refund.* A widget that let you check in/out easily.* You an watch all your shifts and edit/delete them.* You can set up a reminder that will send you notification when it's time to check out.* You can set up your breaks so this time won't be included in the salary calculation.* You can backup/restore your data anytime you want.* You can set the day in the month your salary calculation starts in.* Makes you coffee in the morning ;)You're welcome to 'Like' the Facebook page and contact me there too!http://www.facebook.com/TrackMySalary** Please don't block ads if you appreciate my work, I have to earn money somehow **Permissions:* Internet permissions - For ads only.* External storage permission - For Backup/Restore feature.

reviews.title: Very useful
reviews.comment: As a shift worker I found this app super useful. Would love to see cloud backup feature on future version.
reviews.author: Eran Rom

reviews.title: More flexibility
reviews.comment: Would be a5 star if more flexible, need to be able to enter decimals, add option for 1.5x pay before shift.
reviews.author: john paul tinio

reviews.title: I get payed every 2 weeks
reviews.comment: It would b nice if there was a way to tell me my next paycheck
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Good, but tax probs
reviews.comment: I love how I can enter EXACT times and can see my monthly earnings.  However, the taxes do not enter right (decimals won\'t enter) and what IS entered does not seem to be included in weekly/monthly earnings.  I would also like to see a pay-period grouping option (instead of just overall, weekly, monthly, etc). Works perfectly other than that... and for FREE! Just fix the tax issue and I think it\'ll be perfect! (BTW, it\'s \"sick and tired\", not \"sicking tired\")
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Great
reviews.comment: Great but I wish it would show the sum of tips- only tips. But except for that, its perfect and thanks!!
reviews.author: Sid Feiner

reviews.title: Ok lets see
reviews.comment: So far so good hard to get buttons to press we will see
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Extremely useful!!!
reviews.comment: Would have rated 5 stars if you add integration to the calendar for future shifts but overall the most useful app in my nexus 4!!!!
reviews.author: Michael Amzaleg

reviews.title: Great app
reviews.comment: great for study tracking as well as work hours for independent contractors. A paycheck feature would be great. I currently put what I got paid in comment section.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Below average
reviews.comment: It takes a while for the manual add to appear in the shift section. Plus no decimal point for working overtime. Pls fix.
reviews.author: Muhd Fadhli

reviews.title: great
reviews.comment: would be better if u add scedule also
reviews.author: Ahmad Salman

reviews.title: Great app
reviews.comment: I just love this app. the only thing that needs its a button to deduct the breaks
reviews.author: Jose Figueroa

reviews.title: Very good app
reviews.comment: It\'s very usefull app..but theres is to many time shown to me a force close massage..i hope you can fix it
reviews.author: Hazem Mahroum

reviews.title: Great app, but...
reviews.comment: I miss the feature to add like double pay shifts. I\'m getting double pay if I work on a holiday, like the 25th of December and new years eve. Please add that to this otherwise awesome app!
reviews.author: Izaac Johansson

reviews.comment: Great app!!!
reviews.author: Asaf Kurtz

reviews.title: Samsung Transform
reviews.comment: Missing one thing: estimated taxes by state.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Very helpful
reviews.author: Gal Loker

reviews.title: More options for non-monthly wages
reviews.comment: I don\'t get paid for lunch time & my daily hours vary so it would be helpful if I could enter my lunch time taken each day because it also varies & have it auto deducted from my daily paid hours worked
reviews.author: Andrew Hargreaves

reviews.title: Great
reviews.comment: Just a little problem. I set the first day of week as Monday however it never counts it. It counts from Tuesday. Bug??
reviews.author: Mizuki Kwok

reviews.title: Awesome and helpful
reviews.comment: I absolutely love this app!  Thanks Elad!
reviews.author: Cori Jewel Bretz

reviews.comment: The best salary app in Googly Play!
reviews.author: A Google User
